NewsItem.HEADLINE: RF Front Ends for Mobile Devices 2019 Forecast Update 1 (Excel File) with Research Notes (PDF)
NewsItem.SUMMARY: A definitive review of all RF components used in smartphones, PC, hotspot, and IoT apps, including mm-wave
NewsItem.NEWSLINETEXT: This is a quarterly forecast update. The five-year forecast covers PA, filter, switch, front end modules, and mm-wave modules with shipment, revenue, pricing, and market share estimates. Block diagrams for key smartphones are included.
NewsItem.KEYWORDS: PA Filter Duplexer Quadplexer Switch FEM PAMiD FEMiD
